name: Reverse Pac-Man
description:
It's Pac-Man but you play as the ghost! You'll need to work together with your ghost partners. They aren't the brightest bunch, but with your help, you're sure to catch that Pac-Man!

Something to note about the controls. You CAN'T move backwards. That's how the ghosts in the original game work (for the most part) so you have the same limitation.

Made for the Wowie Jam 4.0 - Collaborate with AI
